name: Caliber Hunt - A Candidate Portal Reviews

review.title: “Right place for professionals with dedication and determination along with fun”
review.pros: Pros – 1. Small enthusiastic crowd2. Business Module is entirely different from any kind of Recruitment related entity3. Every idea and individuality is appreciated and valued4. Professionals are not considered as Robots5. CH - ACP appreciates individuals who do not just dream to succeed , instead work for it6. Believes strongly in team contribution rather than individual contribution7. Team is filled with Like-minded people which contributes to accomplishing assigned targets
review.cons: Cons – Current office Location needs to be changed, as team mates time management gets affected at some point of time.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to induce more work pressure along with maintaining the existing family atmosphere as there could always be a possibility of taking things for granted.

review.title: “Place with right professional values and each individual given priority”
review.pros: Pros – CH-ACP has a small team working efficiently with a single focus. Highly potential and right focus. CH-ACP believes in working together and wining together.
review.cons: Cons – The office location need to be changed for better output.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Appreciate the family environment with serious work nature.

review.title: “A most favorable organization for talents who are not appreciated ever”
review.pros: Pros – CH - ACP is a company which aims to satisfy the demand of employees or common human being rather than merely satisfying its business demand.Its a best place for employees of CH - ACP to learn and grow, as one gets the opportunity to increase knowledge from all levels
review.cons: Cons – Due to location constraints, organization is not able to reach out to the right people who would appreciate and benefit from their services. Since its a new innovation, public would take time to know more about the organization
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Need to think on increasing the company brand value in the market, in-order to reach out to the public

review.title: “A solid platform to professionals who would want to see a true recruiter within them”
review.pros: Pros – For those who wish to grow its the best place with lot of challenges to accomplish and innovation to reach the height. Experience with CH - ACP built in a confidence within me and taught me never to say quit. In CH - ACP together with our team mates and clients we have proved that every problems comes with a solutions. The way we look towards or for solutions makes us different from the usual.
review.cons: Cons – The business module is niche and new which brings in a lot of queries within public to basically understand how different CH - ACP is from any other recruitment related patterns.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – It is essential to introduce a pattern which would educate the public about individual benefits they would experience through the business pattern (module) CH - ACP follows.The cause of Referral Program initiated by CH - ACP and its benefits extended to public needs to be educated and brought into action, in-order to withstand the actual cause of CH - ACP's existence (help a true candidate no longer experience the wrath of recession, frustration of unprofessional managers, unappreciative work culture, long wait of new employment, disruption for personal and professional peace).

review.title: “Opportunity to learn about Recruitment”
review.pros: Pros – Opportunity to learn about recruitment and different domains
review.cons: Cons – Limited employees to communicate and share
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Its been quite magnificent, enjoying my role and responsibilities.”
